name: CornoHuman2020
description:
At the site of the 2020 Galaxy Conference, a new virus -- human appeared on Mars. They multiply rapidly, mine minerals, pollute the environment, and cause harm to the planet. At the same time, they are also infectious.

Mars immediately connected to the healing orbit, but the effect was mediocre. There are more and more viruses. This unknown virus has also appeared on other planets. What is this? ! They named the virus CoronaHuman.
CoronaHuman broke out in an all-round way, and it seems to be uncontrollable! Mercury has developed a new virus COVID-19 against CoronaHuman
, Do something quickly! Save the solar system and win this final battle!

Goal: survival in human virus for certain time; 

Control: Left click/Right-click to use ability 

               Tab: switch planet

Artist:Ruby https://rubyzxuan.itch.io/

Game desinger: Desertfeng https://desertfeng.itch.io/

Programmer/CG :  Desertfeng https://desertfeng.itch.io/

All audioClips come from internet

Engine:Unity2019

Made for  2020AD gamejam  in 14 days  Theme:2020
